programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: What stories lay buried beneath the surface, waiting to be revealed? 200 years on from Raffles landing, archaeologists are digging deep and unearthing new artefacts that reshape what we think we know about Singapore. From uncovering evidence of an ancient settlement, to discovering forgotten relics from the lives of people in colonial Singapore and World War 2, they are piecing together new evidence that will paint a story of Singapore over seven centuries. In this three-episode series, teams of archaeologists will look to the land and seas for clues to seek out these lost chapters of history that are forgotten by time, only to be uncovered today.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Derek Acorahs The Past Hunters continue their investigation of Weir Mill and the search for paranormal activity takes a darker turn. Will they finally uncover the truth behind the buildings dark hauntings?

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Go for launch! We visit Space Shuttle Endeavor at the California Science Center. Then, we check out the glitch and glamour at the Hollywood Museum. Well learn about the Holocaust at the Holocaust Museum and Japanese Internment during WWII at the Japanese/American National Museum. After that, we dig for bones at the famous La Brea Tar Pits.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: Gold, ivory and slaves drove the economy of the East coast of Africa 500 years ago. Join us as we explore the Portuguese and Arab roles in these horrific trade schemes. Well also investigate the pristine waters off the coast of the nearby National Park where our host dons a snorkel mask and comes face-to-face with the creatures of the coral reef.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: The Great Rift Valley is actually where the continent of Africa is literally tearing itself apart. Its a geologic phenomenon where one side is a rainforest full of colorful birds and strange monkeys and the other, a large lake centered on a vast plain. Two bordering eco-zones…double the wildlife.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: On board of an old well-restored English boat, and pushed ahead by the mistral wind, we sail in and around the Sulcis archipelago in Sardinia. Between the islands of SantAntioco and San Pietro, expert marine biologists dive with us down to sea-grass fields to reveal to us the mystery of the Pinna nobilis or Noble Pen Shell and its magic thread.: sea-silk. A marine biologist and the only international expert of sea-silk, Chiara Vigo uncover its secrets for us. Chiara Vigo with her special personality and philosophy of life, who has transformed the processing of sea-silk into a real art. A thread that, thanks to her, becomes gold and also prayer. A treasure to protect and preserve for future generations. A thread that cannot be sold or undersold, but that needs to be protected so as not to disappear into the depths.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: A trip to Sardinia, along the western coast, to the Sinis protected marine area and the Island of Mal di Ventre. Together with Angelo, a local diving instructor, we dive around the Catalano rocks where we swim between the basaltic columns, arches and huge eroded volcanic rocks. Back on land we visit the strange architecture of San Giovanni del Sinis and the famous historic archeological site of Tharros, one of the largest ancient cities in the Mediterranean, founded by Phoenicians and inhabited for 1900 years. We then visit the Mistras lagoon where we see thousands of Flamingos and Cormorants, and it is here that we find Giuseppes riding stables, where he has a center for traditional horse training which is the art of "Monta da Lavoro". And talking of tradition, we end our Sardinian journey with a close-up on Sardinian traditions, local arts and crafts, food and folklore.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Were headed upstate to Albany and Saratoga Springs. Well take the Albany capital tour and see five former NY governors who would become US Presidents. Then, well board the USS Slater and see how America defended its fleet against German U-boats in WWII. Well sample the mineral water in Saratoga Springs, and bet the farm at their famous thoroughbred raceway. Then, well learn how important the Battle of Saratoga was for Americas future at Saratoga battlefield.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: We travel to the end of the rainbow in Dublin, Ireland. Well gawk at the Book of Kells, a holy book displayed at Trinity College. We visited the hallowed halls of St. Patricks Cathedral, and touched famed Irishman, Daniel OConnells crypt at Glasnevin Cemetery. Finally, we learn the complicated history of Irish independence at Kilmainham jail.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Bill Ball breaks the rules and stereo types of travel shows as he ventures beyond the highlights. What do you do after youve lead groups to over 140 countries and all 7 continents? Welcome to Bills bucket list on steroids... Travel Quest. This new, fast-paced series chases Bill around the globe as he seeks out anything but the mundane and ordinary—coming face-to-face with the largest crocodiles in the world, snorkeling with thousands of jellyfish, walking on the rim of an exploding volcano, feeding a group of sharks without a cage, bicycling across the Serengeti... this is not your typical travel show!

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The night sky is a time machine. The further we look out into the universe the further back in time we reach. What we see in the night sky is only a small percentage of the contents of the Universe, most is dark matter and dark energy we know it exists; however its nature eludes us for the moment.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: One hundred kilometres above the Earths surface lies an invisible frontier: the edge of space. This is the Karman Line, the boundary between our planets atmosphere and what lies beyond. What does it take to cross that line?

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: Between the precious islands that make up the Polynesian archipelago, our journey takes us to Maupiti, an island free from luxury resorts, where we can dive and immerse ourselves in this authentic local beauty. Surrounded by five motu, that is to say smaller islands, Maupiti is like Bora Bora 50 years ago: beautiful, wild and pure. Our cameras continue to search for breath-taking landscapes, dreamy lagoons, fields of fruits, sacred places, strips of sand with tall palms and spectacular reefs, inhabited by sting-rays and gigantic eagle-rays. Diving, here in Maupiti, is really special: as well as the grey shark nursery, there is unlimited and very clear visibility. Boundless and unique.

programme.title: Blue Realm
programme.desc: Filmed using crystal clear High Definition technology, The Blue Realm takes the viewer on a fascinating and breath-taking journey of discovery beneath the waves to examine the unique biology and extraordinary behaviour of undersea animals. Filmed by expert divers with a passion for marine life and environment, the compelling stories and captivating creatures come from many locations around the world including Papua New Guinea, Palau, South Africa, the Red Sea, the Great Barrier Reef, the Bahamas, Cocos Island, British Columbia, Texas, Indonesia, the Socorro Archipelago, California and Florida.

programme.title: Of Boats And Men
programme.desc: Travelling by boat bears a priceless sense of Freedom and offers endless new vistas to all passengers. Across waterways around the world Boats are an essential tool of daily life whether they carry goods, serve as utilities or services in remote areas.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: Series introduction and the study of Earth from orbit. The sky above is littered with stars and countless galaxies. It is where we come from and where we are destined to return. The first phase of this journey is complete, now commences the second, with robotics, advanced technologies and sheer daring we are now going where before we only dreamt.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity…

programme.title: Water: H2O Stories
programme.desc: Water: H2O Stories is a 3x52 series revisiting the story of water on planet Earth and its disrupted course over time which has led to the 21st century biggest challenge.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: Zenith - Advances In Space Exploration
programme.desc: Zenith - Advances in Space Exploration reveals these latest developments and the implications they hold for all of us.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The commercial space flight companies are edging closer and closer to flight readiness. Paying customers will soon be launching into space; tourists and their money is thought to be a major step forward into space and beyond. Blue Origin flight tests have been a great success and may launch commercial flights as soon as years end. Virgin Galactic is also smashing mile stones towards flight certification. SpaceX and its Manned Dragon capsule in direct competition with Boeings moves closer to an ISS taxi service.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The ESA - JAXA joint Bepi-Colombo Mission is moments away from launch. The target is Mercury which has been too long neglected; this mission will shed new light on this strange world of light and dark.

programme.title: Fragrance and Emotions
programme.desc: Unique documentary that takes you to discover the secret of some of the most luxurious perfumes and emblematic fragrances in the world. Visit the famous city of Grasse to meet the creators, the beautiful flower fields and all the incredible emotional powers of the Perfume.

programme.title: Depleted Uranium
programme.desc: More than 50 countries now possess weapons based on depleted uranium (DU). Experimentation has been rife, and the consequences for civilians and the military alike have been dramatic. This investigation compares and contrasts the arguments of those who defend and attack a technology that is highly toxic. For 20 years, scientists, doctors, veterans and activists have denounced the use of DU. Against them are the arms industry lobbyists and nuclear authorities who continue to minimise the risks. Through archive documents, interviews and in situ investigations, accompanied by key witnesses (victims, experts...) we aim to present a clearer picture of the issues and stakes linked to the use of DU. Quick-paced, with a sense of urgency, the film underlines the essential background and conflicting viewpoints, enabling viewers to make up their own minds about a subject that concerns us all.

programme.title: Alien Invaders!
programme.desc: Alien Invaders is a documentary special that throws three young, but experienced, hosts into the world of invasive species of animals, fish, birds, insects, viruses and plants to create television mayhem. The show looks at invasions of aggressive non-indigenous animals around the world. Pacific lionfish are eating their way through the Caribbean, Burmese pythons are infesting the Everglades, African killer bees have worked their way north from Brazil to Utah, Asian carp are now swimming in the millions from New Orleans to Chicago. These and many other "alien invaders" are the villains (and stars!) of our show.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: In 1968, a new form of military policing was being developed in a rural area north of Los Angeles. The Los Angeles Police Department sent an observer to this unit, and he, in turn, took this knowledge back to the LAPD. This contributed to the development of the departments ﬁ rst Special Weapons and Tactics (S.W.A.T.) team. This CQB episode takes an historical journey to examine how this incident aﬀ ected and changed police tactics around the world. Using CQBs trademark "sub-second" analysis, the program also looks at how police S.W.A.T. teams train, plan and equip themselves for the challenges of urban combat. The dramatization of a 1980s S.W.A.T. siege of a gang safe-house demonstrates the complicated challenge of protecting innocent people who might be caught in the line of ﬁ re, as well as the speciﬁ cs of the squads training regimen, how they communicated, and the special equipment they used.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Blackpool Pleasure Beach is one of the most visited attractions in the United Kingdom. People visit it not only for the fun, but to also hopefully catch a glimpse of the many ghosts that haunt there.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: The former home of Queen Victoria is now home to many spirits who have been seen by guests and staff. Witness the first ever formal documentation of the paranormal activities in the Bulkeley Hotel.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Up, up and away! We discover St. Petersburg Floridas aviation roots at the St.Pete History Museum. Then, comb your mustache, we visit the Dali Museum to look at Salvador Dalis amazing masterworks. Well dredge the deep looking for sponges, and defend the bay at Fort Desoto.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: The Great Rift Valley is actually where the continent of Africa is literally tearing itself apart. Its a geologic phenomenon where one side is a rainforest full of colorful birds and strange monkeys and the other, a large lake centered on a vast plain. Two bordering eco-zones…double the wildlife.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: To this day sisal, a rope making fiber plant, is a mainstay of the economy. Journeys tours the capital city of Tanzania and its diverse religious institutions before heading into sisal country. Well learn about the German influences and the seldom heard story of Livingstones final trip across Africa.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: The Sinis protected marine area and the Island of Mal di Ventre is the subject of this documentary that takes place in the Eastern part of the Island of Sardinia. In the company of Angelo, a Sardinian diving instructor we go to discover the underwater flora and fauna of the waters around the Island of Mal di Ventre, a place of splendid tropical colors. We then dive to visit the shipwreck of the "Vaporetto": a ferryboat that went down in the Second World War, which is quite well conserved and is home to various types of fish like the groupers and also to sea slugs. We then go to visit the Cabras pool and watch the traditional fishing methods of the flat-headed mullet, a species from which can be extracted the famous "Sardinian Gold": Bottarga (Dried fish eggs) After we have seen how they harvest and transform the fish eggs and also tasted some local dishes using it, we return to the sea with our masks and flippers to enjoy the sea beds around the famous Seu Arches.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: Our destination is the island of Rodrigues, in the Mascarene archipelago, a volcanic folly that is only 109 square kilometres surrounded by an uncontaminated coral reef. We visit the island and discover its beauty on land, underground and also underwater. In the Francois Leguat protected reserve we are privileged to see hundreds of Tortoises, a varying ages and sizes, as they mate undisturbed by our presence and our cameras. A local guide takes us to discover a system of caves that develops 18 metres below sea level. But it is the population of Rodriguez that surprises us the most: A people who have not adopted different ways or customs, but that live their lives proudly with the knowledge that they are fortunate to have been born in such an island paradise both on land and sea.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Were exploring the other side New York state in Buffalo and Niagara. Well take the oath of office like Teddy, at the Roosevelt inauguration site in Buffalo. Then, well take a tour of the Frank Lloyd Wright Martin house and learn about Americas most celebrated architect. We get soaked on the Maid of the Mist at breathtaking Niagara Falls, and defend the walls at Fort Niagara.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Get your sun tan lotion on, because were headed to the land of perfect weather and sunsets. Well sample a fish taco, climb the 100s of steps of the California Tower, stand on the flight deck of the USS Midway, as well as, revisit San Diegos founding on the San Salvador at the San Diego Maritime museum.

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: They orbit between us and our Star, the inner worlds; hidden within the suns glare often only visible at sunrise or sunset. Venus the first and brightest star in the evening sky, and Mercury fleeting across the solar disk. They are half of our solar systems terrestrial planets yet we know so little. As we begin to take a closer look at our companions they are posing more questions than answers.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: It has fired our imaginations for millennia, Mars, the God of War and the source of Mans science fictional demise. We know the dry barren planet was once flowing with vast reservoirs of water, the sky thick and filled with clouds and the tantalizing possibility of life. It is the only other place in our solar system than Man might one day call home.

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity…

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity…

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Before computer drawing programs, there was a toy that if you mastered its two circular white knobs you could have a picture perfect SKETCH. Well explain how the ETCH A SKETCH drew onto the scene. And what did Neil Armstrong REALLY say when he stepped on the moon, the "aahh" answer will surprise you! Plus, where did the explosive name BIKINI come from?

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: It was the PURRRFECT idea for making our furry friends more pleasant around the house! Youll learn how KITTY LITTER clawed its way into our homes. And youll learn how a garment made out of special woven fibers can stop a bullet, plus, why is walking under a ladder bad luck? And finally, well CUT TO THE CHASE and explain the history behind this common phrase!

programme.title: Of Boats And Men
programme.desc: Travelling by boat bears a priceless sense of Freedom and offers endless new vistas to all passengers. Across waterways around the world Boats are an essential tool of daily life whether they carry goods, serve as utilities or services in remote areas.

programme.title: China Uncovered
programme.desc: Fashion designer Ji Cheng has shown her designs at London fashion week and, like beauty stylist A Zhi, is beginning to challenge the monopoly of Western brands in China. New levels of expendable income mean the wallets of the wealthy elite are helping fund this rising beauty scene and creating a market for luxury goods for shrewd businesswoman Felicity Feng. Expats from everywhere are trying to gain a foothold in this blossoming city, but can they handle its lightning speed?

programme.title: China Uncovered
programme.desc: Famous Chinese Erhu player Zhao Lei is leaving his stamp on classical Chinese music by experimenting with musical fusion between the East and West. On a sharper note in downtown Shanghai, Yuyintang Livehouse opens its doors to contemporary music lovers. The spiritual home of cutting edge beats in Shanghai, Yuyintang has started the careers of Visual Kei band Lilith and progressive metal rockers Mathlotus, but the modern music scene is still reeling from the Rock n Roll ban of the Cultural Revolution. Join them as they strive to become the rock stars of tomorrow.

programme.title: Everyday Elements
programme.desc: A series that puts chemistry in our everyday experience by showing the living connection we have with the chemicals and elements that make up our world. The matter that built skies and seas, the atoms that make up you and me, the chemistry around us that forms the things we touch, smell and see. This series shows us what the objects in our universe and in our homes are made from and why the particles around us behave as they do. Everything around us is built from Everyday Elements.

programme.title: Everyday Elements
programme.desc: A series that puts chemistry in our everyday experience by showing the living connection we have with the chemicals and elements that make up our world. The matter that built skies and seas, the atoms that make up you and me, the chemistry around us that forms the things we touch, smell and see. This series shows us what the objects in our universe and in our homes are made from and why the particles around us behave as they do. Everything around us is built from Everyday Elements.

programme.title: A Year in the Wild
programme.desc: A resident baboon on one of the ranches requires some human help to extract a snare. The splinters pack run into a coalition of cheetahs. Jess visits the new-born Splinters pups. Pungwe are on the hunt for big game as they take on formidable buffalo. The Splinters once again demonstrate their extraordinary hunting tactics.

programme.title: Capture Wild School
programme.desc: One of the students is selected and soon locate a huge bull elephant from the helicopter. The dart successfully finds it mark and the bull takes 20 minutes to lie down. The rest of the team rush in to do the necessary data entries and reverse the drug within 20 minutes. The vet lecturers give the debrief and conclude with all the positives and negatives.

programme.title: Capture Wild School
programme.desc: One of the teams prepare for a black and white rhino capture. The white rhino calf has an infection and needs urgent attention. The lecturers brief the team and preparation is done.

programme.title: Race of Life
programme.desc: These are Natures own Battletanks, and (with the exception of the Indian Elephant), all endemic to the African continent. The African Savannah is the stage for thousands of battles every day. How do elephants, these large, cumbersome creatures survive and even prosper on a diet that even the strictest vegetarian would pass on! Well for one thing, most other animals get out of their way. But lions and hyenas are not always so easily moved – they prey on young, sick and old elephants in particular. This seemingly gentle giant has been revealed to have a darker side in the last few years too. They may survive on just plant life, but that doesnt mean they dont like a fight – to the death. Elephants have been observed attacking and killing Rhinos in the last 20 years. Its a savage clash. Meanwhile, the Rhino, a tough looking customer if ever there was one, is an endangered species. When the great herds go on the search for food, predators go on the hunt for them. If ever there was an animal that seems destined to survive, its the Rhino, which has been around for over 6 million years. But it too has an enemy: mankind – the deadliest foe of all. Then theres the hippopotamus. An adult hippo is a huge, aggressive animal, and even the largest crocodiles tend to stay away from it. However, when baby hippos stray from their mothers, then crocodiles, lions and hyenas will have a go if they can get away without being attacked themselves by adults in the baby hippos herd. Thats why baby hippos must stay close to Mum

programme.title: Race of Life
programme.desc: Males and females of most species will fight viciously in self-defense. And females, can be even more aggressive than males when defending their young. In this episode well explore the Race of Life from the point of view of food, territory, social status, and mates. Though some fights occur between two different species, most battles are fought between members of the same species. Though the wildlife warriors in these battles usually are not trying to kill each other, the fighting can result in death. Why would members of the same species fight with such ferocity? Food is one reason. Animals that store and horde food for survival will aggressively protect their pantries. Animals are also willing to fight to protect their food indirectly. For example, predators will defend a territory that provides them with enough prey, or food, to survive. This territorial aggression serves to space out members of a species across their range in a way that maintains sufficient food within each territory. But it also may limit population size. For example, if a pack of wolves cannot find, defend, or take over a suitable territory, the members may starve to death. Though food, territory, social status, and mates may be won and kept by fighting, aggression takes its toll. Animal combatants face exhaustion, injuries, time away from resting and eating, and the ultimate cost of battle: death. Thus, just like human beings, its often in an animals interest to win a war before it ever begins - or to avoid confrontation altogether.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Chasing Tales
programme.desc: The Pungwe pack are in striking distance, will they succeed? The surrounding community gets involved in conservation. Jess is in the right place at the right time to witness something astonishing. Rosemary gets hands on with Africas largest predator as she needs to remove a research collar. The camera crew gets stuck into a muddy zebra rescue. The Pungwe pack execute yet another successful take down.

programme.title: The Polar School of Nomad Children
programme.desc: 360° GEO- Report visits the Nenets, the last true nomads on earth, on their remote Russian peninsula. Every August, on the Russian polar peninsula of Yamal, children of reindeer shepherds await a helicopter that will bring them back to school after the summer holidays. For the main part of the year, 600 nomad children from the indigenous people of the Nenet live and learn separated from their parents. Up until now, their home Yamal was an of Russia that was far from any semblance of civilization- until an enormous gas pool was discovered beneath the tundra. Now, destroyed nature and gigantic industrial plants are a common sight along the nomads track - but this industrial development is also offering new opportunities to their children.

programme.title: A Dogs Life
programme.desc: A Dogs Life explores the widely assumed facts that may actually be based on faulty and out-dated research. Ingenious experiments and meticulous observation reveal that the problems dogs solve best are those that involve interacting with humans. A fascinating and fun documentary that gives us a dogs eye view on the world.

programme.title: Animal Doctors
programme.desc: Explore how animals developed over time and generations their own medicine and health care strategies. How have these been passed onto early humans ? Questioning traditional boundaries between human and animal, we will travel from Central African Republic, to Tanzania, from the US to France with the leading experts in animal behaviour. Todays science revisits the birth of animal intelligence and culture.

programme.title: Mongolia, Steppes Emirate
programme.desc: Battered by strong winds, and seen as a grazing land, Mongolia is the kingdom of steppes. With important mineral resources such as copper or uranium, coal and rare soil, Mongolia future is secure: the economy shows a significant growth rate and it is a business paradise for some expatriates. But for most of the population, needs remain unfulfilled.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: The Bosnian War was an extraordinarily complex event, with many layers of military involvement including NATO forces, national militaries, irregular paramilitary forces, mujahedeen revolutionaries, private security companies, and international intelligence personnel. One tactic in particular struck fear into the hearts of the military and civilians alike: the use of snipers positioned in high buildings. This edition of CQB investigates this speciﬁ c combat technique and how it was countered by opposing forces. Taking viewers inside a "snipers den," the program explains how this tactic was so successfully used by rebel forces-and how traditional military techniques evolved to combat it.

programme.title: Bagātie un bezkaunīgie
programme.desc: Kubas beisbola zvaigznes Jasiela Puiga bīstamā emigrēšana, lai īstenotu savu sapni par MBL - izvairoties no kontrabandistiem, karteļiem, ķīlnieku situācijām un satriecošām nodevībām, beigu beigās kļūstot par "Dodgers" sensāciju.

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Divas jaunas sievietes ierodas Ņujorkā ar sapņiem par lielpilsētu. Nejauša tikšanās izraisa notikumu virkni, kas šos sapņus sagrauj uz visiem laikiem. Izmeklētājiem tikmēr jāapkopo virkne mulsinošu pavedienu, lai sauktu slepkavas pie atbildības.

programme.desc: Kad viņas māte paziņo par 13 gadīgo Lūsiju par pazušanu, policija un tiesu medicīnas izmeklētāji sāk rūpīgu patiesības meklēšanu.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Detektīvi Ostinā atklāj skandalozu ļaunprātīgu izmantošanu dienas aprūpes centrā. Tas šausmina sabiedrību, savukārt sievietes visā valstī nāk klajā ar stāstiem par rituālu vardarbību. Vai ir iespējams, ka aiz tā visa slēpjas sātanistu tīkls?

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Detektīvs Džons Brauns sacenšas ar laiku - Talsā nošauta nevainīga vecmāmiņa. Vai pusaudži varētu būt viņas traģiskās nāves vaininieki?

programme.title: Slepkavība brīvdienās
programme.desc: Agrā Ziemassvētku vakara stundā tirdzniecības centra autostāvvietā tiek atrasts nošauts vīrietis un sieviete. Izmeklētāji uzskata, ka šo nežēlīgo slepkavību varētu būt izraisījis mīlas trīsstūris.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Rodžers Brūks - populārs administrators vienā no vecākajiem Ņujorkas restorāniem - atrasts nogalināts savā dzīvoklī pilsētas slavenajā "Restorānu alejā". Izmeklētāji atklāj upura slēpto dzīvi un stindzinošo iespēju sagaidīt jaunus upurus.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Advokāti Saša Vass un Džeremijs Deins atskatās uz 30. gadu slepkavības lietas izmeklēšanu un atklāj, ka sašķeltā ģimene beidzot ir atkalapvienojusies.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: slepkavas noķeršana
programme.desc: 12 gadus vecās Tijas Šārpas pazušanas gadījums Londonā noved līdz iespaidīgai meklēšanai, kuras laikā policija bija tuvu mājām.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Teksasas kāds vīrs apgalvo, ka pastrādājis simtiem brutālu slepkavību. Lieta pēc lietas tiek izbeigta. Viņam piespriests nāvessods. Daži izmeklētāji gan satraukti spriež, vai aiz restēm ir īstais slepkava. Vai ļaunais slepkava joprojām varētu būt brīvībā?

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Atlantā, no 70 metru attāluma tiek sašauts jauns vīrietis. Detektīvs Darins Smits uzzina par pieaugošo naidu, kas draud sadragāt visu apkārtni.

programme.title: Slepkavība brīvdienās
programme.desc: Jauna sieviete pazūd pēc 4. jūlija pludmales ballītes. Izmeklētājiem ir tikai dažas norādes, ko darīt tālāk. Lietas pavērsiens atklāj, ka viņa varētu būt jaunākais upuris plēsoņam, kas terorizē šo apkārtni.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Pazūd jauna baņķiere, un policija apkopo pēdejos mirkļus, kad viņa redzēta. Izmeklēšana noved viņus pie profesionāļa, kurš nav tāds, kā viņš sevi parāda.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Komanda izskata bēdīgi slavenu lietu par ražīgiem zagļiem Edvardu Devlinu un Alfrēdu Bērnsu, kuriem tika piespriests nāvessods par Beatrises Rimmeres slepkavību 1951. gadā Mančestrā.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: slepkavas noķeršana
programme.desc: Gadus pēc nozieguma uzziniet, kā kriminālistika palīdzēja atrisināt Bekijas Goddenas-Edvardas slepkavību, atrodot slepkavu, kurš diemžēl atkal bija noslepkavojis.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Bikrama joga tiek uzskatīta par pasaulē populārāko jogu, taču vairākas sievietes apgalvo, ka tās dibinātājs Bikrams Čoudharijs viņas seksuāli vajājis un pat uzbrucis. Kā šis vīrietis no dziednieka kļuva par seksuālu nezvēru?

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Kad 90 gadus vecs kara varonis tiek sašauts mugurā, izmeklētāji atklāj, ka viņa bijušais kaimiņš varētu būt atbildīgs par notikušo. Jauna vīrieša nākotne tiek spēji pārtraukta - viņa plāns ātri nopelnīt naudu noiet greizi.

programme.title: Slepkavība brīvdienās
programme.desc: Pamesta automašīna, kas piepildīta ar asinīm, ved izmeklētājus pazudušās sievietes un viņas pusaugu meitas pēdās, kas nekad neieradās uz ģimenes ballīti 4. jūlijā. Viņu mirstīgās atliekas tiek atrastas dīķī, un mazpilsētā katrs tiek turēts aizdomās.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Pazūd jauna baņķiere, un policija apkopo pēdejos mirkļus, kad viņa redzēta. Izmeklēšana noved viņus pie profesionāļa, kurš nav tāds, kā viņš sevi parāda.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Komanda izskata bēdīgi slavenu lietu par ražīgiem zagļiem Edvardu Devlinu un Alfrēdu Bērnsu, kuriem tika piespriests nāvessods par Beatrises Rimmeres slepkavību 1951. gadā Mančestrā.

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Kamēr Fils ved Heiliju ekskursijā pa savu alma mater, Klēra dodas uz pilsētu kopā ar vīrieti, kuru viņa kļūdaini uzskata par Mičela un Kamerona geju draugu. Glorija ir satraukta un ziņkārīga par Menija sūtījumu.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Fils mēģina uzcelt mājiņu kokā. Heilija cīnās ar koledžas iestāšanās esejas rakstīšanu. Kamerons meklē sievieti, lai uzvarētu derībās ar Mičelu. Džejs nevēlas dejot salsu kopā ar Gloriju un citu pāri.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Raimonds iztaujā Debru par budžetu un saka, ka viņš var labāk, tāpēc viņa ļauj viņam iesaistīties. Pēc dažām nedēļām Rejs pārskaita čekus, un viņam ir 300 dolāru pārtēriņš. Viņš izveido viltotu čeku grāmatiņu, lai dokumentos viss izskatās labi.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Rejs ķircina Robertu par viņa darbu policijā, tādēļ Roberts uzaicina viņu braukt līdzi patruļā. Rejs saņem vairāk, nekā viņš gaidīja, liekot viņam aplūkot Robertu jaunā gaismā.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls un Pema sāk savu pirmo dienu Maikla Skota papīra uzņēmumā, apvienojot pārējos darbiniekus un cenšoties savākt naudu.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Sāk parādīties spriedze un vilšanās, Maiklam, Pemai un Raienam pārceļot Maikla Skota papīra uzņēmumu uz šauru "darba vietu" biznesa parkā.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: Teds
programme.desc: Tuvojoties mācību gada beigām, Teds plāno palīdzēt Džonam zaudēt nevainību.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Ģimenei vācot preces citai ģimenei, kuru māja nodega, Džejs masāžas laikā izsaka apkaunojošu piezīmi Filam. Klēra ir greizsirdīga par Mičela draudzību ar Gloriju, savukārt Kamerons cīnās ar busiņu autostāvvietā.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Fils ir sarūgtināts, ka Klēra slāpē viņa radošumu. Mičels netic Kamerona stāstam par "punkin chunkin". Glorija neļaus Džejam pateikt Menijam, ka viņa Pateicības dienas centrālais elements ir briesmīgs. Heilija un Alekss iekļūst avārijā.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Slepus pārlūkojot Stīva un Mārsijas vēstules, Als un Pegija aizpilda pieteikumu televīzijas spēļu šovam "How Do I Love You", kura mērķis ir pārdzīvot fizisku spīdzināšanu no sava laulātā. Als un Pegija parādās šovā, izliekoties par Stīvu un Mārsiju, un viņi viegli iegūst daudzas balvas. Kad Stīvs un Mārsija to uzzina, viņi izliekas par Alu un Pegiju. Vīrs, kurš elektriskajā krēslā pārdzīvo visvairāk spīdzināšanas, iegūst jaunu automašīnu.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Pēc došanās ar Stīvu uz sacensībām Als nevēlas atklāt, ka laimējis 1200 dolārus, jo zina, ka Pegija un bērni paņems naudu sev. Kamēr Als mēģina atvairīt Pegijas aizdomas par seksu, Stīvs pieprasa arvien pārbagātākus kukuļus par Ala laimestiem, lai viņš turētu muti par naudu.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Rejs un Debra nespēj izgulēties. Iemesls tam ir Allija, kas sākusi gulēt viņu gultā.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Rejs uzzinājis, ka Marijai patīk Eimija vairāk nekā Debra, jo viņa ir "labā" meitene.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls atgriežas Dunder Mifflin un prezentē Raienu un Pemu kā pārdevējus, taču esošie pārdevēji pieprasa, lai Maikls atdod viņiem nozagtos klientus. Tikmēr daži darbinieki ideju par piektdienas vienkāršību uztver pārlieku nopietni.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls mēģina radīt telpu, kur izbēgt no darba, to radot noliktavā, kas tika izmantota Maikla Skota papīra uzņēmumam. Džims un Pema apsver ideju aizbēgt un apprecēties šajā pat dienā.

programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Smieklīgā sieviete
programme.desc: Džemma Artertone tēlo Blekpūlas skaistumkaralieni, kura dodas uz 60. gadu Londonu, lai īstenotu savus šovbiznesa sapņus.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Fils ir sarūgtināts, ka Klēra slāpē viņa radošumu. Mičels netic Kamerona stāstam par "punkin chunkin". Glorija neļaus Džejam pateikt Menijam, ka viņa Pateicības dienas centrālais elements ir briesmīgs. Heilija un Alekss iekļūst avārijā.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Pēc ārsta apmeklējuma, bet nokavējis zvanu par testa rezultātiem, Fils automātiski izdara pārsteidzīgus secinājumus un sāk atvadīties. Havjers atkal bez brīdinājuma parādās un aizved Meniju uz zirgu skriešanās sacīkstēm, kā dāvanu dzimšanas dienā.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Al klusie trīs dienu nedēļas nogales plāni noskatīties viņa iecienīto Džona Veina filmu "Hondo" tiek sabojāti - Pegijas ekscentriskie radinieki ierodas apciemot Bandijus. Radinieki - viņas neredzētā, resnā māte, onkuļi druknais Ērvins un sievišķīgais Oto, kā arī dziedošu un dejojošu radu trio. Als pārtrauc un sabojā romantisko vakaru starp Stīvu un Mārsiju, lai izstāstītu par savām problēmām.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Als atrod bibliotēkas grāmatu, kuras nodošanas termiņš bija 1957. gadā. Viņam tā jāatdod bibliotēkā un jāsastopas ar savām ļaunākajām bērnības bailēm: bibliotekāriem.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Smieklīgā sieviete
programme.desc: Džemma Artertone tēlo Blekpūlas skaistumkaralieni, kura dodas uz 60. gadu Londonu, lai īstenotu savus šovbiznesa sapņus.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Mis Mārpla atrod draudzenei darbu netālu esošajā Grīnšovas folijā. Kad vairāki biedri tiek atrasti miruši, aizdomās tiek turēti visi, un neviens nevar iedomāties, kādus noslēpumus atklās Džeina.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Tiek atklāti rīcības motīvi, un slepkava sūta vēl vienu brīdinājumu Džūditai, Bekai un Sjūzijai, kam jādara viss iespējamais, lai pēc iespējas ātrāk atrisinātu lietu.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoks izmeklē lidmašīnas katastrofu, kuras rezultātā gāja bojā pilots. Atklājas zemisks noslēpums, kas saistīts ar Džeimsu Pendriku.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Pēc noziedznieku bēgšanas no cietuma un bankas aplaupīšanas Mērdoks un Krebtrijs mēģina tikt galā ar ziņojumiem par vīru ar šaujošu roku.

programme.title: Grāmattārps
programme.desc: Harkapa nāves izmeklēšana turpinās, un Buks atklāj kaut ko pārsteidzošu par izrakumos atrasto skeletu. Viņam būs nepieciešama liela atjautība, lai atrisinātu šīs lietas.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Nozagta vērtīga Čārlza Dārvina skice, un apdrošināšanas uzņēmums noalgo Elizu to atrast, taču drīz atklājas pavērsiens.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: 1939. gada pavasaris: Tristans ir kvalificēts veterinārārsts, un Džeimss uzsāk jaunu dzīves posmu ar Helēnu. Tomēr tā kā karš glūn ap stūri, visiem ir jāapsver sava loma Darovbijā un ne tikai.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Lietai pret Ēriku pieaugot, Peregrīna pārliecina viņu atklāties par pagātnes noziegumu, kas attīrīs viņa vārdu par slepkavībām, un Violetas apslēptie talanti pakļauj viņu un Peregrīnu briesmām.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Peregrīna slepenībā nonāk īpaši slepenā zinātnes iestādē pēc tam, kad viens no tās darbiniekiem, vecs Birdie biedrs, tiek atrasts līdz nāvei sasalis avarējušā automašīnā.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Eliza piespiedu kārtā slēpjas, kad kļūst par galveno aizdomās turamo, kad pilsētas morgos notiek vairākas ielaušanās. Hercogs mēģina atrast citus aizdomās turamos, Eliza griežas pēc Mozus palīdzības.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Sākoties izmaiņām Skeldale House, visi cenšas saprasties, kā vien var, un Helēna ir ievākusies augšstāva istabā ar Džeimsu.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoks izmeklē lidmašīnas katastrofu, kuras rezultātā gāja bojā pilots. Atklājas zemisks noslēpums, kas saistīts ar Džeimsu Pendriku.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Lēdija Tresiliana negribīgi rīko viesības savā Devonas īpašumā. Miss Mārpla, sena lēdijas Tresilianas draudzene, ir ieintriģēta, kad dzird stāstu par bērnu slepkavu, kas tā arī netika notiesāts.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Peregrīna slepenībā nonāk īpaši slepenā zinātnes iestādē pēc tam, kad viens no tās darbiniekiem, vecs Birdie biedrs, tiek atrasts līdz nāvei sasalis avarējušā automašīnā.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Sākoties izmaiņām Skeldale House, visi cenšas saprasties, kā vien var, un Helēna ir ievākusies augšstāva istabā ar Džeimsu.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Bijušais detektīvs Karls Albergs pārceļas uz nelielu piekrastes pilsētiņu, lai rastu mierinājumu un saskaras ar virkni slepkavību. Iedzīvotāja slepkavībā Albergs aizdomās tur citu vietējo iedzīvotāju.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Lēdija Tresiliana negribīgi rīko viesības savā Devonas īpašumā. Miss Mārpla, sena lēdijas Tresilianas draudzene, ir ieintriģēta, kad dzird stāstu par bērnu slepkavu, kas tā arī netika notiesāts.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad jurista nāve tiek uzdota par suņa uzbrukumu, Mērdokam rodas aizdomas, ka vainīgajiem ir vajadzīgs suns, kas mantojis milzīgu summu.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoka kaimiņiene Tipija Longfelova pārliecina viņu izmeklēt lietu, kurā nozaudēta vēstule ar nāves draudiem.

programme.title: Bīstamā draudzība
programme.desc: Annai izdodas pamodināt Luiju XIII no miesīgās letarģijas, pateicoties Marijas sniegtajiem padomiem. Karaļa pilī uz īsu brīdi valda harmonija, taču karalienes kritiens izjauc romantiku.

programme.title: Sisi
programme.desc: Seriāla noslēdzošajā sezonā Austrijas ķeizariene Sisi turpina dzīvot starp ilgām pēc brīvības un pienākumiem pret impēriju. Pēc Korfu pārciesta smaga kritiena no zirga Sisi atgriežas vecāku māja Posenhofenā. Pēc tēva nāves atklājas ģimenes noslēpumi, un Sisi nākas cīnīties par ģimenes īpašuma saglabāšanu. Tikmēr Francis gaida Sisi atgriešanos galmā. Starp abiem briest jaunas nesaskaņas. Vai viņu mīlestību vēl būs iespējams glābt?

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad laboratorijā tiek noslepkavota viņu galvenā aizdomās turamā doktore Eleina Montgomerija, Peregrīna un Džeimss ir spiesti redzēt, ka viņu slepkavas motīvi ir daudz dziļāki, nekā viņi abi bija uzdrošinājušies uzskatīt.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīza tiek nolīgta, lai atrisināju šantāžas lietu Viktorijas laikmeta medicīnas iestādē, un sastop jaunu konkurentu, kas vēlas viņu nolīgt vai izspiest no tirgus.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Sigfrīds saņem nepatīkamus jaunumus, un Helēna redz, cik smagi Džeimss strādā, taču viņa nevēlas viņam palīdzēt, lūdzot savam tēvam izpildīt nepopulāro TB testēšanas shēmu.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Mis Mārpla priekšā lielākais izaicinājums, kad viņa saņem norādījumus no drauga izmeklēt iespējamu noziegumu, bet nezina, kas tas ir par noziegumu.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Albergs un Gibsonas policijas nodaļa strādā, lai atrastu vainīgo, kad Kasandra nonāk dzīvībai bīstamā situācijā.

programme.title: Hārdakri
programme.desc: Šis ir stāsts par strādnieku šķiras ģimenes Hārdakru dzīvi, mīlestību un ceļu uz bagātību 19. gs. beigu Jorkšīrā.

programme.title: Mesjē Speids
programme.desc: Speids aptaujā ekscentriskus kaimiņus un uzzina par noslēpumainā zēna talantiem. Terēza turpina izmeklēšanu vienatnē, bet Žans Pjērs risina pagātnes problēmas un satiek Filipu.

programme.title: Mesjē Speids
programme.desc: Ir 1963. gads, un leģendārais detektīvs Sems Speids bauda pensijas gadus Francijas dienvidos, tomēr baumas par sena ienaidnieka atgriešanos izjauc šo idilli.

programme.title: Global Week-End
programme.desc: News stories as they happen. Analysis and coverage of the most important global events as they unfold providing insight into their significance and relevance for communities worldwide. From politics to society all that has an impact or will impact on the globe as a whole is presented in an accessible and insightful form to allow one to keep up-to-date on the factors changing the world we live in.

programme.title: The Spirit of Yachting
programme.desc: An exploration of the exciting world of sailing and the most important sailing events which take place all around the world. Each episode is dedicated to a specific sailing competition, telling the stories of the passionate people who participate, including events such as The Giraglia Rolex Cup or The Rolex Sydney-Hobart Yacht Race.

programme.title: "Tre Valli Varesine"
programme.desc: The Tre Valli Varesine is a semi classic European bicycle race held in Varese, Italy. Since 2005, the race has been organised as a 1.HC event on the UCI Europe Tour.

programme.title: Climbing: World Cup Seoul
programme.desc: The Seoul Climbing World Cup is part of the Sport Climbing World Cup organized by the International Federation of Sport Climbing IFSC. Competitors will compete in speed climbing and bouldering.

Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Так далеко, так близко
programme.desc: Настя с сыном Иваном впервые за долгие годы приехали в город из деревни староверов. Их окружает чужой, непривычный, полный опасностей и соблазнов мир.

programme.title: Miss Nobody
programme.desc: Unlucky in love, living at home with her eccentric mom, and stuck in a dead end secretarial job at Judge Pharmaceuticals, Sarah Jane longs for more out of life. Her surprise promotion to junior executive appears to be just the ticket. But with promotion comes a competitive new world of wily, complicated executives, and Sarah Jane begins to eliminate the competition the only way she knows how - murder. During her climb to the top, she unexpectedly falls for the man of her dreams, Detective Bill Malloy - the cop intent on cracking the case of the mysterious deaths at Judge Pharmaceuticals.

programme.title: The Zodiac
programme.desc: THE ZODIAC takes a different look at the famous Zodiac Killer case from other screen treatments of the murders. More than a simple crime story, the film is an emotional thriller focusing on the murders impact on victims, their families and the wider community. The film follows a police detective and his son who become obsessed with the murders and endanger their family in the process.

programme.title: Black Cop
programme.desc: Follow the contradictory and challenging story of an African Canadian cop. He has been attacked by his fellow officers and becomes the victim of racial profiling. The policeman is struggling between duty and moral obligation, and is pushed over the edge. He decides to take revenge on his community.

programme.title: House of the Stone Monkeys
programme.desc: The action proceeds along two tracks and two time frames. We meet the boy, who lives with his mother in a Budapest apartment house, in the summer of 2012. Another boy is spending his vacation with his grandparents in the same building in the summer of 1982. The house unveils its mysterious secret to both of them.

programme.title: Nico the Unicorn
programme.desc: A 12-year-old disabled boy, whose father recently passed away, has his life changed when the pony he rescues gives birth to a unicorn. Can he save the unicorn from the people who want to exploit it?

programme.title: Caesar
programme.desc: Epic look at Julius Caesar, Romes last dictator, whose death also signaled the end of the Roman Republic. Chronicles his campaigns in Gaul and Egypt, his rivalry with General Pompey, and his eventual assassination at the hands of Brutus and Cassius.

programme.title: Almost Friends
programme.desc: Charlie, a culinary genius, has lost the motivation. He doesnt know what to with his life anymore, but he knows one thing - get close to Amber. In comparison to her boyfriend, he seems to be totally unattractive, but Charlies closest friend convinces him that where theres a will theres a way.

programme.title: Talea
programme.desc: Summertime. Everybody is excited to go on vacation to Italy. Everybody but Jasmin. Jasmin is yearning something. She wants to be with Eva, her mother, from whom she had to live seperately for a long time. For weeks, Jasmin is trying to get close to Eva. She does not give up, even if shes rejected. After an argument, Jasmin runs away from her fosterhome and convinces Eva to leave the city together and go on a trip. The two get closer -- sometimes as friends, sometimes as mother and daughter. A first joint cigarette, a dance in the village disco, wanderings through the woods. But expectations and needs of the girl and her mother are diverging repeatedly, especially when a man attracts Evas attention and disturbs the growing closeness between mother and daughter.

programme.title: Field of Lost Shoes
programme.desc: Based on a true story of the American Civil War, culminating at the Battle of New Market, May 1864. A group of teenage cadets sheltered from war at the Virginia Military Institute must confront the horrors of an adult world when they are called upon to defend the Shenandoah Valley. Leaving behind their youth, these cadets must decide what they are fighting for.

programme.title: Max Cloud
programme.desc: A space cruiser crash lands on the purple planet of Heinous, an intergalactic prison that is home to the most vile and dangerous villains in the galaxy. All of the crew have perished except for its pilot; intergalactic space hero Max Cloud, the ships hapless chef Jake, and its reluctant Commander, Rexy. Their mission is simple, wait inside their vessel until help arrives and try their best to keep the prisoners outside from getting in, however this is Max Cloud and he doesnt do simple. ...But this is not real life. This is a video-game, and at the helm of the adventure is Sarah, a teenage video game fanatic who immerses herself in fantasy to avoid dealing with her less than packed social life and a strained relationship with her dad, straight laced single parent Tony. After a fallout, Tony bans Sarah from playing games and in a frenzy of teenage emotion Sarah makes a wish, that in the blink of an eye becomes a reality... With a flash of pixelated light Sarah is transported into the video game by the mysterious Space Witch, who exists in an etherial void, behind a secret door, that never appears in the same place twice! So Sarah finds herself trapped inside the game and the only person who can help her is her equally socially defunct but incredibly charming friend, Cowboy, who must control Sarah from her bedroom in Brooklyn and keep her from losing her one life, in a game that cant be paused, that they have never finished before! To make matters worse Sarah has not found herself inside the body of the wonderful Max Cloud, but Jake, thats right... the hapless chef. We follow Sarah as she negotiates the terrifying and dangerous planet of Heinous alongside the ever confident Max and fed up Rexy, jumping back and forth with the real world as the pressure mounts on Cowboy and the real stakes start to rise. They soon encounter stranded Bounty Hunter, Brock Donnelly, and realise they must get off the planet before help arrives as the planets surface burns so hot every day that anything not underground is space liquid! AND to add to the stakes Cowboy must keep his best friend away from the evil clutches of the games villain Revengor, a part man, part machine, lunatic who is hell bent on taking Max Clouds ship and with an army of prisoners and an evil sorcersss called SHEE, his chances look pretty damn good. The action bounces between the video game and the real world as Cowboy and Sarah must come together to get her home, all leading to the ultimate showdown in Revengors lair, where back in Brooklyn, video game expertise arrives in the form of a very unlikely hero. Sit down. Plug in. Its time to play THE INTERGALACTIC ADVENTURES OF MAX CLOUD.

programme.title: The Cooler
programme.desc: In an old school Las Vegas casino, its top gambling jinx breaks his curse when he falls in love, much to his boss consternation.

programme.title: Pirates of Somalia
programme.desc: In 2008, rookie journalist Jay Bahadur forms a half-baked plan to embed himself among the pirates of Somalia. He ultimately succeeds in providing the first close-up look into who these men are, how they live, and the forces that drive them.

programme.title: Hangman
programme.desc: A fisherman discovers an abandoned sailboat and decides to board. He finds no signs of life, but when he gets back on deck his own boat appears to have disappeared. What follows is an absolute nightmare.

programme.title: When Do We Eat?
programme.desc: A familys Passover gets screwy after the patriarch unknowingly ingests a hit of Ecstasy.

programme.title: The Ambassador to Bern
programme.desc: Attila Szaszs political thriller portraying the events of the hostage taking of the Hungarian ambassador to Switzerland in the aftermath of the 1956 Hungarian Revolution. The film was presented at numerous festivals all over the world. It won the Frederico Fellini Award at Tiburon International Film Festival.

programme.title: Irish Jam
programme.desc: Upon discovering that their town is up for sale, crafty Irish villagers scheme to raise the money to prevent the buy-out...

programme.title: Scout Camp
programme.desc: The Fire Dragon patrol, with their ever-supportive scoutmaster, is headed to Camp Rakhouta for what should be the best week of their lives. But when the "Team Spirit Stick" of the camp goes missing, the entire tradition of the camp is threatened.

programme.title: Raspberry Magic
programme.desc: "Raspberry Magic" is a coming-of-age story about 11-year-old Monica Shah, who thinks she must win the science fair in order to bring her father back after he runs out on the family. She blames herself for her parents problems, and takes charge when her mother falls into a deep depression. Set behind the backdrop of a beautiful forest, Monicas experiment uses touch therapy to help raspberries grow faster. She asks, is it nature or nurture that can truly help a being grow? Does it even matter? Through her ups and downs with her family, she learns that its a complex question, and the answer isnt so simple.

programme.title: Its a Perfect Night for Suicide
programme.desc: A comedy about a psychic who pretends to believe that magic exists, a gigolo who pretends to believe the psychic, an illusionist who pretends to be somebody else and a desperate woman who believes she will find true happiness in love... when shes dead. Lenka is a psychic who besides telling fortunes is great at depriving her clients of them, with the help of an extraordinary uncle-illusionist. The business flourishes until Lenkas most profitable client, a soulful Buddhist Yvonne, decides to commit suicide. She was jilted by the man of her dreams - Oscar. Whats more, Yvonne wants to leave a suicidal note, pointing to Lenka as the cause of all her misfortunes. Lenkas entire world falls apart. She must dissuade Yvonne from killing herself and in her desperation is ready to use all her magical skills to make Oscar fall in love with Yvonne. However, Lenka doesnt even suspect shes entering the lions den. A dangerous game begins. The full moon is on the rise - and, surprisingly, the magic starts to work for real. It turns out that the scenario written in the stars is not an easy thing to change...

programme.title: The Phantom Father
programme.desc: The Phantom Father tells a story of an American professor Robert Traum, who takes a sabbatical from his teaching job to trace his roots in Romania. Traum soon discovers that he comes from a wealthy family involved in organized crime. He manages to reestablish contact with the sole remaining link to his otherwise deceased family—Sami. Rocco Castoro, the editor-in-chief of VICE magazine called the movie the best Romanian movie hes ever seen.

programme.title: 10 Things We Should Do Before We Break Up
programme.desc: Abigail, a self-sufficient single mom meets Ben. They both think every great relationship ends in disaster. On the first date they come up with 10 things to do together before they break up. But the estimated end is not so sure - because fate adds #11 to their list.

programme.title: Among Thieves
programme.desc: Three friends - a reporter, an oil analyst and a financial executive - reunite after ten years and accidentally uncover one of the key, hidden reasons for what motivated the war in Iraq. The trio struggles to present evidence to major media that America invaded Iraq to force oil sales from the Euro back to the Dollar to preserve US global monetary supremacy. Against incredible odds, the team must face their pasts, find willing sources to corroborate the story, and survive the conspirators as they push to bring the truth to light.

programme.title: Rat Race
programme.desc: Donald P. Sinclair has placed six separate gold coins in different slot machines in his casino. The lucky six who find these coins discover an opportunity of a lifetime. The chance to own $2 million. Locked up in a locker in New Mexico, these six contestants must now race each other, to be the first to the cash. There are no rules in place and everything that could possibly happen, does. Whilst, behind the scenes, Sinclairs associates are placing their bets.

programme.title: Noble Things
programme.desc: Jimmy Wayne Collins finds himself adrift in Memphis, Tennessee. Forced to return home to the piney woods of Southeast Texas, Jimmy will face his imprisoned brother, his dying father and the demons he left behind.

programme.title: Modigliani
programme.desc: The story of Amedeo Modiglianis bitter rivalry with Pablo Picasso, and his tragic romance with Jeanne Hebuterne.

programme.title: Black Water
programme.desc: A deep cover operative awakens to find himself imprisoned in a CIA black site on a submarine.

programme.title: True Smile
programme.desc: Sergio, a 26-year-old autistic male is blind and has never seen a smile. He does, however, give everybody a sincere smile every day. A documentary based on the amazing story encapsulated by Sergio Aznarez Rosados life.

programme.title: Brīvības skaņa
programme.desc: Neticams, bet tomēr patiess stāsts par bijušo valdības aģentu, kurš kļuvis par modru modrības sargu. Viņš devies bīstamā misijā, lai glābtu simtiem bērnu no cilvēku tirgotājiem.

programme.desc: Bruņojies tikai ar vārdu "Tenet" un cīnoties par visas pasaules izdzīvošanu, CIP aģents dodas ceļojumā cauri starptautiskās spiegošanas krēslas pasaulei globālā misijā, kas risinās ārpus reālā laika robežām.

programme.title: Tālu no trokšņainā pūļa
programme.desc: Viktorijas laikmeta Anglijā neatkarīgā un stūrgalvīgā Batšeba Everdena ir lepna un skaista sieviete, kura piesaista triju dažādiem sabiedrības slāņiem piederošu vīriešu uzmanību. Pēc Batšebas tikšanās ar aitu fermas īpašnieku Gabriēlu Ouku pārgalvīgo seržantu Frensisu Troju un turīgo vecpuisi Viljamu Boldvudu, viņu dzīves vairs nekad nebūs tādas, kā iepriekš.

programme.title: Kolete
programme.desc: Apprecoties ar populāro rakstnieku Villiju, Sidonija Gabriele Kolete no Francijas laukiem nonāk 19. un 20. gadsimta mijas Parīzes intelektuāļu vidē. Vīra pierunāta, Kolete kļūst par viņa rēgu rakstnieci un uzraksta daļēji autobiogrāfisku romānu par dumpīgu lauku meiteni vārdā Klodīne. Romāns gūst lielus panākumus, un Kolete saraksta vairākus tā turpinājumus. Koletes cīņa par radošajām īpašumtiesībām met izaicinājumu sabiedrības priekšstatiem par literatūru, dzimumu lomām, modi un seksualitāti.

programme.title: Dzīve aiz kadra
programme.desc: Meklējot ideālu filmēšanas vietu mazā, klusā pilsētiņā Vecās Dzirnas atbrauc kino darbinieki. Šeit viņi taisās lēti un ātri uzņemt savu jauno šedevru, kura darbība risinās uz vecu ūdens dzirnavu fona.

programme.title: Manis te nav
programme.desc: Kāds vīrietis cīnās ar traģiskām pagātnes atmiņām, cenšoties izprast savu tagadni. Tomēr drīz vien viņš apjauš, ka laiks nav tāds ienaidnieks, par kādu viņš to uzskata.

programme.title: Joprojām Alise
programme.desc: Lingvistikas profesore un viņas ģimene nonāk krustcelēs, kur jāpārbauda uzticība - viņai diagnosticēta Alcheimera slimība.

programme.title: Lielās cerības
programme.desc: 19. gadsimta sākuma Londona. Ar noslēpumaina labdara palīdzību nabadzīgais jauneklis Pips, kas uzaudzis bez vecākiem, negaidīti iekļūst Londonas smalkajās aprindās. Jaunajā džentlmeņa statusā viņš uzmeklē Estellu - daiļo bagātas ģimenes atvasi, ko iemīlējis vēl būdams mazs puika. Taču, ja kāds atklātu viņa patieso pagātni, sagrautu jauno cilvēku un visu, kas viņam dārgs...

programme.title: Tēvi un meitas
programme.desc: Džeiks ir Pulicera balvu ieguvis rakstnieks, kurš traģiskā auto katastrofā zaudē savu mūža mīlestību un ir spiests vienatnē audzināt savu piecgadīgo meitu Keitiju. Pārvarējis vainas izjūtu par savas sievas nāvi, viņš cīnās gan ar ikdienas tēva pienākumiem, gan pret pārlieku valdonīgajiem radiniekiem, kuri grib atņemt viņam tēva tiesības un paši audzināt Keitiju.
